name: Cercli
headline: Rippling for Middle East & North Africa
description: Cercli is the single modern platform for Middle East & North Africa (MENA) businesses to hire, manage and pay their global workforce. We automate your local and remote payrolls, HR, onboarding, compliance, expenses and more - to help organisations reduce human error and stay fully compliant.

founders.name: Akeed Azmi, Founder
founders.description: Founder at Cercli, formerly Head of Growth, Expansion & Operations at MENAs largest tech unicorns Kitopi & Careem (acquired by Uber).

founders.name: David Reche, Founder
founders.description: Founder at Cercli, former VP Product & Engineering at Kingmakers (Draftkings for Middle East and Africa). Prior to this held product and engineering leadership roles at Careem (acquired by Uber in 2020).

generated_description:
**Cercli: Streamlining Workforce Management in MENA**

Founded in 2023, Cercli is a SaaS company positioned to redefine how businesses in the Middle East and North Africa (MENA) manage their global workforce. You can think of it as the Rippling of the MENA region—offering a seamless, modern platform for hiring, managing, and paying employees around the world.

At its core, Cercli automates everything from payroll to HR functions, onboarding, compliance, and expense management, all from a single secure platform. By reducing the risk of human error and ensuring compliance with local laws, Cercli is geared towards empowering organizations to operate efficiently and effectively.

**Key Features:**
- **Comprehensive Team Management:** Cercli allows businesses to manage employment and payroll data securely.
- **Multi-Currency Payroll:** Companies can pay their teams in multiple currencies while generating payslips or contractor invoices.
- **Expense Reimbursements:** Streamline the review and processing of team expenses in any currency.
- **Time Off Management:** Track and manage time-off policies and requests seamlessly.
  
**Why Cercli?**
Cercli offers a united source of truth for employee data while ensuring compliant hiring practices for both employees and contractors. It simplifies payroll processes—think automated reports, compliance with tax filings, and avoiding expensive fines. The platform is designed to cater specifically to the nuances of the MENA region.

**Cultural Values:**
Cercli isn’t just about technology; it’s about people. The company prides itself on ownership, efficiency, and long-term thinking—all wrapped up in a culture of empathy and transparency. They believe that the power of their business lies in their people, promoting open communication and collaboration within their teams.

**Backed by Experience:**
Cercli is a proud member of the Y Combinator Batch S23, supported by established ventures like Afore and Cotu. The company, with a lean team of 10 people, is helmed by Group Partner Aaron Epstein, who brings a wealth of experience to the table.

In an era where remote work is more prevalent than ever, Cercli stands out by providing a streamlined, user-friendly platform tailored for businesses in MENA. If you’re looking to automate your workforce management, you might want to check them out [here](https://www.cercli.com) or book a demo to see it in action. 

In summary, Cercli is not just building a product; it’s shaping the future of workforce management in a critical region of the world. And that’s something worth watching.
